name: Loopthing
tag_list: loopthing, business, social, networking, ventures, products, advertising, exposure
overview:
Loopthing is a new online business network which provides businesses with an opportunity to control all of their online business information through a dedicated profile page. Our company was formed in 2007 with the aim of making the online experience of businesses and customers much more interactive, socially enabled and media driven.

We have designed a space where businesses can create their own profile page and upload all their media and descriptive content to provide their customers with a detailed image of their day-to-day businesses operations. All types of businesses are welcome to upload their content, with no limitation on industry type or geographical location.

Our primary objective is to provide an online environment where mass business media generation is captured and utilised by site visitors to inform them in their decision making process.

milestones.description: OpenScore launched, a live presentation of this is available
